column22: In the Solver Parameters dialog box:
Set Objective: Click the cell containing your objective function formula (e.g., V2).
To: Select Min (as you want to minimize total cost).
By Changing Variable Cells: Select the range containing your decision variables x_i (e.g., O2:O14).
Subject to the Constraints: Click Add for each constraint:
Decision Variables Binary: Select the range O2:O14. From the dropdown, choose bin.
